description:
EASTER SALE! Now only $0.99/£0.79

Notekeeper is an intuitive and lightweight notes application for Palm Pre. It features a simple interface & sleek design. 

UPDATES:

v0.4.0:
- Added ability to reorder notebooks.
- Added ability to reorder individual notes in a notebook.
- Added the ability to change the tab background.
- Fixed some minor issues in sync.

v0.3.0:
- Bug fix: Book list now resizes when notifications are present.
- Bug fix: Username and password save correctly when leaving the Sync screen.
- Formatting of Sync documents improved.

v0.2.0: 
- Added ability to rename notebooks. 
- Sync page now remembers username and optionally remembers password.

FEATURES:

* Notebook tab interface - quickly switch between notes using the page tabs in notebooks.

* Read View - Rotate the phone into landscape to put a note in Read View for ease of viewing.

* Upload your notes to Google Docs!

Available from the Palm App Catalog.
